description: An object representing a Server Variable for server URL template substitution.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text â€” the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: The default value to use for substitution, and to send, if an alternate value is not supplied.
An optional description for the server variable.
An enumeration of string values to be used if the substitution options are from a limited set. Constraints: items must be unique.
